original_text: And King David longed to go to Absalom, for he was consoled concerning Amnon’s death.
korean_text: 다윗 왕의 마음이 압살롬을 향하여 간절하니 암논은 이미 죽었으므로 왕이 위로를 받았음이더라

sentences.original_text: And King David longed to go to Absalom
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다윗 왕은 압살롬에게 가고 싶어했다

sentences.original_text: for he was consoled concerning Amnon's death
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 암논의 죽음에 대해 위로를 받았기 때문이다
